item.title: Massaman Lamb Shanks
item.description: Ingredient Amount Lamb Shank 2 Curry Paste 1/2 can Potato 1 red Onion 1/2 Coconut Milk 270ml Chicken Stock 1 cup (low salt) Cinnamon Stick 1 Star anise 1 Rice to serve Veg to serve Corriander to serve Method # Pre heat the oven to 160degC
